reviewText:
I saw the ghoul vhs today.i found it a good horror classic.freddy Francis does a good job as director.
shame it's not on dvd.
The low-budget quality of this film is what drew me to it initally and I recommend it anyone with a penchant for british horror
Greatest movie of all time. This isn't my opinion. It is a fact. Before you leave this dimension and go on to the next one, make it a point to watch this one.

The ghoul stars Peter Cushing and John Hurt. It's not a great
movie for classic horror mystery fans. Cushing gives his all
as usual but John Hurt's character as a psycho was just annoying.
the movie isn't horrible but I would say only for Cushing fans like me.
